name: Horror Dungeons
description:
The story is short for now because its a small demo, please give me some feedback so I can improve my game and myself :).

If you want to make a Video feel free to do so, i would like to watch it!

Story: You are a prisoner that escaped its cage and now has to find a way out of an Dungeon where he was held for over 10 years writing down every day what happened in his Diary.

If you would like to support me you can do that on Patreon: Link

Controls: 

Left Mouse: Use

Right Mouse: Alternative Use (for example to lift an object up and carry it arround.)

Middle Mouse: Focus Look

Q: Lean Left

E: Lean Right

Z: Camera Zoom / Flashlight Focus

CTRL: Crouch

Shift: Run

Space: Jump

1: Pistol

2: Glowstick

3: Flashlight

4: Lighter

5: Torch

6: Night Vision Camera

7: Cameroid

TAB: Inventory

Middle Mouse: Slide / Zoom Inspectable Object

E: Ecamine Inspectable Object

R: Rotate Physics Item

T: Throw Physics Item
